trans-unit.resname: PL21·1★ | Sethron, Hurloon General | Card Name
PL21·1★ | Sethron, Hurloon General | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever Sethron, Hurloon General or another nontoken Minotaur enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/3 red Minotaur creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当夏浓将军塞松或另一个非衍生物的牛头怪在你的操控下进战场时，派出一个2/3红色牛头怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: PL21·1★ | Sethron, Hurloon General | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{B/R}: Minotaurs you control get +1/+0 and gain menace and haste until end of turn. ({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.)
trans-unit.target: {2}{B/R}:直到回合结束，由你操控的牛头怪得+1/+0且获得威慑与敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: PL21·1 | Moraug, Fury of Akoum | Card Name
PL21·1 | Moraug, Fury of Akoum | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control gets +1/+0 for each time it has attacked this turn.
trans-unit.target: 对每个由你操控的生物而言，它本回合中每攻击过一次，便得+1/+0。

trans-unit.resname: PL21·1 | Moraug, Fury of Akoum | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if it's your main phase, there's an additional combat phase after this phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，若当前是你的行动阶段，则在此阶段后额外多出一个战斗阶段。在该次战斗开始时，重置所有由你操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: PL21·2 | Ox of Agonas | Card Name
PL21·2 | Ox of Agonas | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Ox of Agonas enters the battlefield, discard your hand, then draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 当阿戈纳司境蛮牛进战场时，弃掉你的手牌，然后抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: PL21·2 | Ox of Agonas | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Escape—{R}{R}, Exile eight other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
trans-unit.target: 逸脱～{R}{R}，从你的坟墓场放逐八张其他牌。（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其逸脱费用。）

trans-unit.resname: PL21·2 | Ox of Agonas | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Ox of Agonas escapes with a +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 阿戈纳司境蛮牛逸脱时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: PL21·3 | Angrath, the Flame-Chained | Card Name
PL21·3 | Angrath, the Flame-Chained | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Each opponent discards a card and loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: +1：每位对手各弃一张牌且失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: PL21·3 | Angrath, the Flame-Chained | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−3]: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step if it has mana value 3 or less.
trans-unit.target: −3：获得目标生物的操控权直到回合结束。将之重置。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。在下一个结束步骤开始时，如果其法术力值等于或小于3，则将它牺牲。

trans-unit.resname: PL21·3 | Angrath, the Flame-Chained | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−8]: Each opponent loses life equal to the number of cards in their graveyard.
trans-unit.target: −8：每位对手各失去等同于其坟墓场中牌的数量之生命。

trans-unit.resname: PL21·4 | Tahngarth, First Mate | Card Name
PL21·4 | Tahngarth, First Mate | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tahngarth, First Mate can't be blocked by more than one creature.
trans-unit.target: 大副坦格尔斯不能被多于一个生物阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: PL21·4 | Tahngarth, First Mate | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent attacks with one or more creatures, if Tahngarth is tapped, you may have that opponent gain control of Tahngarth until end of combat. If you do, choose a player or planeswalker that opponent is attacking. Tahngarth is attacking that player or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手以一个或数个生物攻击时，若坦格尔斯已横置，则你可以令该对手获得坦格尔斯的操控权直到战斗结束。若你如此作，则选择任一该对手所攻击的牌手或鹏洛客。坦格尔斯向该牌手或鹏洛客进行攻击。
